title: My friend changed his nickname, but on my chat menu it still shows his old one
body:
My friend changed his nickname, but even after some time, it still didn't updated on my chat tab his new one. 
[Screenshot of the chat tab, still shows his old nick](https://image.prntscr.com/image/kdQhRFK1RtaeGsYBguy8yA.png)
[Screenshot of his profile, it shows his updated nick](https://image.prntscr.com/image/NY05du2bSOG4Bqkx-BBvvg.png)
It's not that of a big deal, but it bothers me that it didn't updated on my client his new nick, while others friends that changed their nicknames, chat tab updated their new one. He changed nick month ago, and in that period of time i installed windows couple of times and download fresh installation of league.
His nick is "l am oscar" with L at the start not I

replies.body: That's really strange!   Have you also tried removing and re-adding him? Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case so our tech team can take a look and figure out why the name's not syncin'g on your account.
